_source.text: 10 Men are Better than One One of the most talked about aspects of the 2004 version was the addition of 10-man motion-capture technology.

text: 10 Men are **Better** **than** One One of the most talked about aspects of the 2004 version was the **addition** of 10-man **motion**-capture technology.

_source.text: A 120Hz refresh rate does not guarantee the absence of motion blur (nothing prevents a pixel from taking more than 1/120 second to switch) but it is a good indication that the response time of this panel is better.

text: A 120Hz refresh rate does not guarantee the absence of **motion** blur (nothing prevents a pixel from taking more than 1/120 second to switch) but it is a good **indication** that the response time of this panel **is** **better**.
